original_response.summary_text: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He was the first African-American president of the United States, and a member of the Democratic Party. Prior to his presidency, Obama served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008, and an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004.

standardized_response.result: Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He was the first African-American president of the United States, and a member of the Democratic Party. Prior to his presidency, Obama served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008, and an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004.
